title: Energy Treatment
description: Hair and scalp energising treatment, with a ginseng and caffeine base for dry, taut scalp and fragile hair prone to falling out. Revitalises and refreshes the scalp, preparing it for the Energy Lotion. Can be pulled into the mid-shafts to make detangling easier, without weighing down.
cleaned_text: Hair and scalp energising treatment Energising treatment with a ginseng and caffeine base for dry, taut scalp and fragile hair prone to falling out. Revitalises and refreshes the scalp, preparing it for the Energy Lotion. Can be pulled into the mid-shafts to make detangling easier, without weighing down. Size 200/1000 ml
